name: Mobile Driver
description:
Little mobile game prototype, save .apk file to your android and share your thoughts about it in comments. And if you like it - you can even donate a little to keep my motivation to  finish it quicker on a higher level=) Controls: to turn a car just tap on appropriate side of the screen.

IIn future i plan to add a different tracks, music, effects, maybe even a multiplayer or blackjack and hoo..)
